rukus.text: 54|41|ara abasya'i phira’a'una sampradayera kache esechila satarkakari
54|42|tara amadera saba nidarsane mithyaropa karala, sutaram amara mahaparakramasali o sarbasaktimanarupe taderake pakara'o karalama.
54|43|Tomadera madhyakara kaphirara ki tadera ceye bhala? Na ki tomadera abyahatira kono sanada rayeche purbabati kitabe
54|44|naki tara bale, ‘amara eka sanghabad'dha aparajeya dala? ’
54|45|E dala to sighra'i parajita habe ebam pitha dekhiye palabe [1]
54|46|baram kiyamata tadera sastira nirdharita samaya. Ara kiyamata habe kathinatara o tiktakara [1]
54|48|Yedina taderake upura kare tene niye ya'oya habe jahannamera dike; sedina bala habe, ‘jahannamera yantrana asbadana kara.’
54|49|Niscaya amara pratyeka kichu srsti karechi nirdharita parimape [1]
54|50|ara amadera adesa to kebala ekati katha, cokhera palakera mata [1].
54|51|Ara abasya'i amara dhbansa karechi tomadera mata dalaguloke. Ata'eba, upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|53|ara chota bara saba kichu'i likhita ache [1].
54|54|Niscaya muttakira thakabe baga-bagica o jharnadharara madhye
